notification.contentToBeAnonymized: Umtfombo wakho utawufihlwa ngemfihlo emalangeni lasikhombisa kulandzela
notification.communityContentToBeAnonymized: Konkhe kutawutfombo kwakho kulomphakatsi kutawufihlwa ngemfihlo bese kugcinwa emalangeni lasikhombisa, ngemuva kwaloko ungeke usakwati kususa nome kushintsha. Buka umtfombo wakho ngezansi.
notification.groupContentToBeAnonymized: Konkhe kutawutfombo kwakho eqenjini kutawufihlwa ngemfihlo bese kugcinwa emalangeni lasikhombisa, ngemuva kwaloko ungeke usakwati kususa nome kushintsha. Buka umtfombo wakho ngezansi.

email.possibleFraudFooter: Cofa kulenkundla yemphakatsi ngezansi, ngena njengemphathi bese ukhetha Ukuphathwa Kobugebengu kumenyu.
email.possibleFraudSubHeader: Inombolo yemisebenti lengahle ibe nobugebengu ngekucabanga kwetindlela letingu-75% tebugebengu
email.possibleFraudInformation: Sistimu yetfu lezenzakalelayo ibonile imisebenti lengahle ibe nobugebengu. Ungabuka ngokucophelela ngekusebentisa sikhungo semphathi wemphakatsi. Letinye talatimisebenti tingaba nesizathu lesingekho nobugebengu ngako hlola ngokucophelela ngaphambi kokususa umtfombo.
email.automaticToxicityDetection: Lomtfombo uhloliwe ngokuzenzakalela njengelobungozi ngokusebentisa emakhalekhukhwini e-AI lalinganisa bungozi balomtfombo. Ungasusa lomtfombo uma kudingeka.
email.automaticToxicityDetectionVision: Umakhalekhukhwini we-AI ngokuzenzakalela ubonile sithombe lesihambisana nalomtfombo. Lomakhalekhukhwini uhlola tithombe ngokubheka kutsi tingaba naletintfo letingcolile, letinodlame, letingokwelashwa, kanye naletinokushesha. Ungasusa lomtfombo uma kudingeka.
email.automaticToxicityDetectionDisclaimer: Ngezinye izikhathi i-algorithm ye-AI ibala umphumela ongalungile, kulokhu ungakhathazeki, awudingi kuthatha sinye isinyathelo futhi ungaziba le imeyili.
email.user_invite_2: Cofa kulenkanyeti noma uyincamule ebhawuseni lakho lewebhu kutsi wamukele sicelo
email.reset_password_2: Uma awukaceli loku, sicela ungayinaki le imeyili.
email.reset_password_3: Iphasiwedi yakho ngeke ishintshe kuze kube uyavula le linki ngenhla bese wakha entsha.
